PLEASE UPLOAD THE NEW BOOK COVER IMAGE HERE

The attached fairy book cover image should be saved as:
assets/suncatcher-cover.jpg

This will replace all instances of the book cover throughout the site.

The new cover features:
- A fairy with wings in a green dress
- Magical pastel sky background
- Sparkles, butterflies, and flowers
- The title "Suncatcher Spirit" with "poems by Yaya Starchild"

All references in the code have been updated to point to: assets/suncatcher-cover.jpg
